str2: If not, unless, whether at all. From me and the neuter of tis; whether at all.
Bitter, acrid, malignant. Perhaps from pegnumi; sharp, i.e. Acrid.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To cause to gush forth, send forth. A primary verb; to swell out, i.e. to gush.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A fountain, spring, well, issue, flow. Probably from pegnumi; a fount, i.e. Source or supply.
